title: ZAWNAWLNA
lyrics:
Aw Chhandamtu sual leh buaina karah hianin 78
Aw fak ru Pathian Beramno 74
Aw Halelluia Lalpa ropui ber 8
Aw hmangaihna ka sawi thiam lo 148
Aw hmangaihna khawvel Entu 140
Aw hmangaihna min thlah lotu 257
Aw hmangaihna sawi thiam ila 136
Aw Isu kei min kal pel suh 255
Aw ka thlarau tho la 376
Aw Kalvari thing chungah chuan 199
Aw Kalvari tlang chungah chuan 190
Aw kan Lalpa khawvel entu 566
Aw kan Pathian, i rinawmzia a ropui 29
Aw khawiah nge an awm Lal hnathawktu 392
Aw khawiah nge Chhandamtu chuan 217
Aw Lal Pathian, i kutchhuak thilsiam tinreng 18
Aw Lalpa Chungnung ber kan fak hle a che 434
Aw Lalpa Davida leh a thlah arsi 9
Aw Lalpa i malsawmna hlu 553
Aw Lalpa i ta chauh ka ni e 168
Aw Lalpa kan chungah hian 311
Aw Lalpa mal min sawm la 50
Aw Lalpa min lawmin 44
Aw Lalpa rawn lantir ang che 312
Aw Lalpa tithianghlim ang che 447
Aw lei leh van tuifinriat Lal 589
Aw mi sang tam tak zaite chu 63
Aw nang kan Lal kan Pathian (Ro min rel sak ang che) 585
Aw nang vanrama kal duh mi chuan 296
Aw nangni Lalpa lo kalna nghaktute u 242
Aw Pathian i khawngaihna 559
Aw Pathian nang Lalber i ni 16
Aw Pathian Nang ngilnei ber 581
Aw Pathian Nangman chanchin tha min pe 346
Aw ropui ber Haleluia 71
Aw thawhrim leh buaina piahah 395
Aw Thlarau Thianghlim lo kal la 308
Aw tunah hian chanchin mak tak chu 77
Aw van Lalpa chu rawn fak ru 11
Aw van leng rual zai thiamte u 80
Aw van Thlarau Thianghlim lo leng ang che 507
Aw zan thianghlim mawi takin arsi an eng 124
Aw, khawngaihtu Pathianin 36
Aw, rinna thuk nei ila 21
